title: Model
overview: The life and work of a model. The passion and success stories of young men and women in the modeling industry. Famous actors, a tight story line with abundant episodes, and a fast pace maintains the fun and bounciness of the drama. A mixture of comedy, psychopathy, and melancholy in one drama showing the various fashion shows, modeling contests, and competitiveness of the clothing companies to uphold its scale. It also presents criticisms on sex merchandising and the immorality of society.
